title: Chasuble Back, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, gold thread
Technique: stem and satin stitch embroidery; lined with plain weave
description: Chasuble back with embroidery in colored silks and metal thread on gold-colored buratto net in a design of curving stems with conventionalized flowers and leaves. Embroidery is arranged in three panels by two strips of gold trim in a lozenge design. Bordered with silver lace. Lined with pink silk plain cloth.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chasuble Back, late 19th century.Medium: silk, gold thread
Technique: stem and satin stitch embroidery; lined with plain weave. 1947-22-1.
